title: The Market Shop and Sallyport Gallery
description: A traditional health food store with art gallery and craft gallery at the rear. Sells vitamins, herbs, supplements, homeopathic and alternative remedies, aromatherapy oils, cereal, grains, dried beans, spices, dried fruit, nuts, teas, flours, special diet foods. Note: The shop is on Bridge Street between Hide Hill and West Street (there is a small pedestrian lane called Shoe Lane which leads up to Eastern Lane and the Maltings Arts Centre).
